XIV.2.C.2.a
.
Unverified SSNs Work Item Information
The table below contains a description of the two work items that are created based on the Unverified Social Security Numbers matching program.
Work Item Code
Name
Description
834D
SSN NOT IN FILE
SSA did not issue the SSN in the VA record.
834E
SSN DOES NOT MATCH
Identifying information in VA records does not match SSA records.
Note
:Â  This does not necessarily mean the SSN is incorrect.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 2, Section C - Social Security Number (SSN) Verification
